A summary:
- you can learn new russian words 
- good to make new enemies (wouldn't recommend for new friends)
- Spend your money on "useless" pixels, that somehow increase more in value than stocks
- good to learn aim patterns if you want to get deployed to iraq
- learn how to cope with racism and hard insults

Would recommend for pre school kids
